effects.display_string: Set: When you attack a target afflicted by Sigil of Flame, your damage and healing are increased by 2% and your Stamina is increased by 2% for 8 sec, stacking up to 5.

Set: Sigil of Flame's periodic damage has a chance to flare up, shattering an additional Soul Fragment from a target and dealing 13,797 additional damage. Each 40 Fury you spend reduces its cooldown by 1.0 sec.

spells.description: Use: Turn your hands to gold, causing your next 5 auto-attacks to deal 60,374 extra Physical damage. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
